instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Override 'tailwind.config.js' to include 'Syne' and 'DM Sans'. Ensure 'darkMode' is class-based but force the app to be dark by default (add 'dark' class to html or body).
2. GLOBAL CSS: Update 'index.css' to set background to #050505 and text to #FFFFFF. Remove any light mode defaults.

3. HERO SECTION: Build a full-screen hero with the 'hero_bg' image. Use a heavy overlay (bg-black/60) to ensure text readability. The headline 'CLARITY LABS' should be massive (text-9xl) and use the 'Syne' font.
4. STORYTELLING: Implement the 'Problem' section as a horizontal scroll container using Framer Motion. It should slide through 'Bad Demos', 'Confused Users', 'Lost Revenue'.
5. CONVERSION: Place a 'Book a Demo' CTA in the nav (sticky), after the Problem section, and a massive one at the footer.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for the 'Contact' modal but style it with the 'glassmorphism.heavy' visual enhancer.
7. DO NOT use standard card layouts. Use 'Bento' grids where items span different columns (col-span-2, col-span-4) to create visual interest.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. For client logos, use the abstract geometric images masked as circles or squares to simulate logos.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text blocks without purpose.
Use 2-3x more padding than usual (py-32 for sections).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
